# Producing a simple feed

Let's see how publish `sciencegeist` RSS data for the latest month.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(headliner)
library(dplyr)
data(sciencegeist)

sciencegeist %>% 
  filter(pubDate > "2020-06-01") %>%
  build_hd(top_title = "Sciencegeist newest posts")

```
